thread.section_title: The Sims 4 | Forum | Game Issues | EA Answers HQ | EN
thread.title: invisible showers - Answer HQ

author: e5f0616f36d95c2
title: invisible showers - Answer HQ
text:
Product : The Sims 4
Platform : PC
Which language are you playing the game in? English
How often does the bug occur? Every time (100%)
What is your current game version number? 1.110.311.1020 DX9
What expansions, game packs, and stuff packs do you have installed? Growing together, parenthood, book nook, university, greenhouse, blooming rooms, seasons, cats and dogs, horse ranch, cottage living, get to work, vampires, werewolves, outdoor retreat, dream house decorator, my wedding stories
Steps: How can we find the bug ourselves? By using 2 showers: the new horse ranch shower and university shower
What happens when the bug occurs? When I use the 'barrelwood shower' and 'EZPZ shower stall', the objects do not appear but when you click on them there is an outline. They are fully functional just not visible. But then when you move the shower outside in the open, the shower is visible. But in the house or a room it isn’t.
What do you expect to see? The objects inside
Have you installed any customization with the game, e.g. Custom Content or Mods? Not now. I've removed them.
Did this issue appear after a specific patch or change you made to your system? Neutral/Not Sure
‌
Showers appear invisible in house but visible outside.
